game.name: Linkshift
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Touch Only Option, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: An addictive new arcade puzzle game with roguelike elements that lets you link Nodes together to form big combo chains. Unlock and create your own set of Jokers to bend the rules, take advantage of randomized boosters and tech yourself onto the leaderboards.
